overview: Dr. John J. Savarese is a Managing Director at Montreux Equity Partners. Dr. Savarese is a board director or observer for several Montreux portfolio companies, including MAKO Surgical (NASDAQ: MAKO), Bayhill Therapeutics, Pivot Medical (Chairman), Avantis Medical Systems, Novalar Pharmaceuticals, and KFx Medical. In addition, he was actively involved in Montreuxâ€™s investment decisions in Aryx (NASDAQ: ARYX), Orexigen (NASDAQ: OREX), Somaxon (NASDAQ: SOMX), Cerexa (Forest labs), Novacardia (Merck), Renal CarePartners, Asthmatx, Glaukos, and Novostent. Prior to joining Montreux, Dr. Savarese served as Director of Business Development and Marketing with the entrepreneurial team at NeurogesX (NASDAQ: NGSX), a Montreux portfolio company focused on the treatment of neuropathic pain.
